1.title: Birth Foretold
1.keyEvent: Announcement of John the Baptist and Jesus' births

2.title: Nativity and Childhood
2.keyEvent: Birth of Jesus and His early years

3.title: John's Ministry
3.keyEvent: John the Baptist prepares the way for Jesus

4.title: Jesus' Temptation
4.keyEvent: Jesus is tempted and begins His ministry

5.title: Calling Disciples
5.keyEvent: Jesus calls fishermen and heals the sick

6.title: Sermon and Miracles
6.keyEvent: Sermon on the Plain and healing on the Sabbath

7.title: Faith and Forgiveness
7.keyEvent: Healing of the centurion's servant and forgiveness of sins

8.title: Parables and Power
8.keyEvent: Parable of the sower and calming the storm

9.title: Mission and Transfiguration
9.keyEvent: Sending of the twelve and Jesus' transfiguration

10.title: Good Samaritan
10.keyEvent: Parable of the Good Samaritan and teaching on prayer

11.title: Teachings on Prayer
11.keyEvent: Lord's Prayer and Jesus' teachings on spiritual matters

12.title: Warnings and Watchfulness
12.keyEvent: Exhortations to be ready and faithful servants

13.title: Repentance Urged
13.keyEvent: Call to repentance and healing on the Sabbath

14.title: Humility and Discipleship
14.keyEvent: Teachings on humility and cost of following Jesus

15.title: Lost and Found
15.keyEvent: Parables of the lost sheep, coin, and son

16.title: Stewardship Lessons
16.keyEvent: Parable of the unjust steward and teachings on wealth

17.title: Faith and Service
17.keyEvent: Teachings on faith, forgiveness, and coming of the kingdom

18.title: Prayer and Persistence
18.keyEvent: Parables on persistent prayer and the rich young ruler

19.title: Triumphal Entry
19.keyEvent: Zacchaeus saved and Jesus enters Jerusalem

20.title: Authority Questioned
20.keyEvent: Jesus' authority challenged and parables to leaders

21.title: End Times
21.keyEvent: Jesus teaches about the destruction and second coming

22.title: Last Supper
22.keyEvent: Jesus institutes the Lord's Supper and is arrested

23.title: Crucifixion
23.keyEvent: Jesus is tried, crucified, and buried

24.title: Resurrection
24.keyEvent: Jesus rises and appears to disciples
